front.title: A YANG Data Model for MPLS Base

abstract.t: This document contains a specification of the the MPLS base YANG model. The MPLS base YANG model serves as a base framework for configuring and managing an MPLS switching subsystem on an MPLS- enabled router. It is expected that other MPLS YANG models (e.g. MPLS LSP Static, LDP or RSVP-TE YANG models) will augment the MPLS base YANG model.
